contact.pageSubtitle: Ready to maximize your refund? Our tax experts are here to help. Contact us for a free consultation and see how we can save you money.
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours

contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your specific tax situation or questions... (minimum 10 characters)
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.quickActionsSubtitle: Need immediate assistance? Try these options
contact.guaranteeMessage: We guarantee maximum refunds, accurate filing, and full audit protection. Your satisfaction is our commitment.
contact.faqSubtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services
contact.faqQ1: How quickly can you prepare my return?
contact.faqA1: Most individual returns are completed within 24-48 hours. Business returns typically take 3-5 business days depending on complexity.
contact.faqA2: Yes! Full audit defense is included with every tax return we prepare. We'll represent you before the IRS at no additional cost.
contact.faqQ3: Can I file from anywhere in the US?
contact.faqA3: Absolutely! We serve clients in all 50 states and offer both virtual consultations and in-person meetings where available.
contact.faqQ4: What if I'm not satisfied with your service?
contact.faqA4: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll make it right or provide a full refund.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: The CPA team was incredibly knowledgeable and helped me find deductions I didn't even know existed. Professional service from start to finish.

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.content: Fast, efficient, and professional. The entire process was seamless and my CPA answered all my questions promptly.

testimonial3.name: Maria Garcia
testimonial3.content: Best tax service I've used. They made everything easy to understand and were always available when I had questions.

faq1.question: How quickly can I get my refund?
faq1.answer: With direct deposit, you can receive your federal refund in as little as 24 hours after IRS acceptance. Paper checks typically take 2-3 weeks.

faq2.question: What documents do I need to file?
faq2.answer: You'll need your W-2s, 1099s, receipts for deductions, last year's tax return, and any other income or deduction documents. Our platform will guide you through everything you need.

faq3.question: Is my information secure?
faq3.answer: Yes! We use bank-level 256-bit encryption and are IRS-authorized. Your data is protected with the same security standards used by major financial institutions.

faq4.question: What if I need help during filing?
faq4.answer: Our CPAs are available via chat, phone, or video call. Premium plans include unlimited CPA support throughout the filing process.

faq5.question: Do you offer audit protection?
faq5.answer: Yes! All our plans include free audit protection. If you're audited, we'll represent you and handle all IRS communications at no extra cost.

hero.title: Over 30 Years of
hero.subtitle: From a small family operation in Atlanta and Chicago to a trusted national partner, our journey has been guided by one simple commitment: helping every client feel supported, informed, and confident in their financial decisions.

beginnings.title: Our Humble Beginnings
beginnings.imageAlt: Small family business serving local community
beginnings.paragraph1: Over 30 years ago, Tax Genius was born out of a small, family-run operation serving the local communities of Atlanta and Chicago. Back then, we worked side-by-side with neighbors, small business owners, and hardworking families who needed guidance through the complexities of the tax code.
beginnings.paragraph2: In those early days, our commitment was simple: help every client feel supported, informed, and confident in their financial decisions.

trust.title: Building Trust & Expertise
trust.paragraph1: With each passing year, our team grew in knowledge and capability. We listened closely to the concerns of our clients, learned from their experiences, and honed our craft.
trust.paragraph2: By offering transparent advice, personalized tax solutions, and hands-on support, we became more than just another tax preparation serviceâ€”we became trusted partners who cared deeply about improving our clients' financial well-being.

community.title: Investing in People & Communities
community.imageAlt: Community workshop and financial literacy training
community.paragraph1: Our commitment to community has always been at the heart of Tax Genius. We've created jobs, supported local training initiatives, and invested in charitable programs that give back to the neighborhoods we've served from the start.
community.paragraph2: By offering financial literacy workshops, sponsoring educational endeavors, and empowering our team members to volunteer, we aim to uplift the communities that have been instrumental to our success.
community.item1Description: Supporting local employment and career growth
community.item2Description: Investing in professional development and education
community.item3Description: Supporting community causes and volunteer initiatives

innovation.title: Embracing Technology & Innovation
innovation.imageAlt: Modern tax preparation software and digital innovation
innovation.paragraph1: As the world of finance evolved, so did we. We expanded beyond traditional in-office services to develop intuitive online tax preparation software.
innovation.paragraph2: Today, our innovative digital platform combines decades of tax expertise with user-friendly tools. This ensures that anyone, from first-time filers to seasoned business owners, can navigate their taxes with ease and peace of mind.
innovation.cardDescription: Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with access to real CPAs whenever you need personalized guidance.

vision.title: Our Vision Forward
vision.paragraph1: Today, Tax Genius stands as a modern, forward-looking company rooted in the values that shaped our early days. As we continue to grow and adapt, our mission remains constant: to provide expert guidance, accessible tools, and unwavering support to everyone who trusts us with their tax needs.
vision.paragraph2: It's our honor to help you find clarity, confidence, and comfort in your financial journeyâ€”now, and for many years to come.
vision.teamImageAlt: Diverse team collaboration at Tax Genius
vision.teamCaption: Our team is ready to serve you

q1.question: How much can I earn per referral?
q1.answer: You can earn up to $50 per successful referral. The exact amount depends on the tax package your referral purchases.

q2.question: Is there a limit to how many people I can refer?
q2.answer: No! There's no limit. Refer as many people as you want and earn unlimited income.

q3.question: When do I get paid?
q3.answer: You'll receive payment within 7 days after your referral successfully completes their tax return and payment.

q4.question: How do I track my referrals?
q4.answer: You'll have access to a real-time dashboard showing all your referrals, their status, and your earnings.

q5.question: Can I refer my own family members?
q5.answer: Yes! You can refer anyone - friends, family, coworkers, or anyone who needs tax help.

q1.question: How long does it take to file my taxes?
q1.answer: Most returns are completed within 3-5 business days after you submit all required documents. Complex returns (business, investments, rental property) may take 5-7 days. Rush service is available for urgent situations.

q2.question: What documents do I need to file?
q2.answer: You'll need W-2s from employers, 1099 forms for other income, receipts for deductions, last year's tax return, and any relevant tax documents like 1098 (mortgage interest), 1095-A (health insurance), etc. Your CPA will provide a personalized checklist.

q3.question: Can I file taxes from any state?
q3.answer: Yes! We prepare federal and state returns for all 50 states. Our CPAs are licensed and experienced with multi-state filings, including part-year resident returns.

q1.question: When do I pay for tax preparation?
q1.answer: You pay after your return is completed and you've reviewed and approved it. We don't charge until you're 100% satisfied. Payment is due before we file with the IRS.

q2.question: How quickly will I get my refund?
q2.answer: With direct deposit, federal refunds typically arrive in 7-21 days after IRS acceptance. Paper check refunds take 2-4 weeks longer. We track your refund status and notify you of updates.

q3.question: Do you offer refund advances?
q3.answer: Yes! Eligible clients can receive their refund in 24 hours with our instant refund advance program. Approval and loan amount depend on your expected refund and credit check.

q1.question: Will I work with the same CPA?
q1.answer: Yes. You're assigned a dedicated CPA who handles your return from start to finish. They're available year-round for questions and become familiar with your tax situation.

q2.question: How do I communicate with my CPA?
q2.answer: You can message your CPA directly through our secure portal, schedule video calls, or call their direct line. Most CPAs respond within 24 hours on business days.

q3.question: Are your tax preparers licensed?
q3.answer: All our preparers are licensed CPAs (Certified Public Accountants) or Enrolled Agents (EAs) authorized to represent clients before the IRS. All hold active licenses and complete continuing education.

q1.question: Is my information secure?
q1.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level 256-bit encryption, secure servers, and strict access controls. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and comply with IRS security requirements for tax preparers.

q2.question: Who has access to my tax information?
q2.answer: Only your assigned CPA and authorized support staff. We never sell your data. All employees sign confidentiality agreements and undergo background checks.

q3.question: What happens to my documents after filing?
q3.answer: Documents are securely stored for 7 years (IRS requirement) then permanently deleted. You can download your return and documents anytime from your secure portal.

cta.title: Still Need Help?

accuracyGuarantee.description: We guarantee 100% accuracy on tax calculations. If the IRS determines errors were made, we will:

step3.title: Get Your PTIN & Certification

step4.title: Start Preparing Returns & Earning

dayInLife.title: A Day in the Life of a Tax Preparer in {city}
dayInLife.intro: Wondering what your daily routine will look like? Here's a realistic snapshot of a successful tax preparer in {city} during peak season (January-April):

time1.description: Review client emails from your {localArea}. Respond to document requests and schedule virtual appointments. No commuteâ€”you're already at work in your pajamas if you want!

time2.description: Meet with 2-3 clients via Zoom. Review their W-2s, 1099s, and discuss deductions. Most meetings last 30-45 minutes and can earn you $150-$500 per return.

time3.description: Take a real lunch breakâ€”{localActivity}. You control your time.

time4.description: Use Tax Genius Pro software to prepare 3-5 returns. Simple W-2 returns take 30-45 minutes. More complex returns with Schedule C or rental properties take 1-2 hours.

time5.description: Submit completed returns to the IRS electronically. Follow up with clients on refund timelines and answer any questions.

time6.description: Close your laptop knowing you earned $800-$1,500 today. Spend your evening however you wantâ€”no boss, no office, no problem. Check out the {servicesLink} you can offer to maximize income.

dayInLife.offSeason: During off-season (May-December), you can work 10-15 hours per week serving business clients with bookkeeping, quarterly taxes, and planning servicesâ€”keeping income steady year-round. Learn more about {joinLink} and building your tax practice in {city}.

buttons.primary: Apply Now - Become a Tax Preparer

q1.question: How much do tax preparers make in {city}?
q1.answer: Tax preparers in {city} with Tax Genius Pro earn between $75,000 and $150,000+ annually. Part-time preparers average $75,000, while full-time professionals with an established client base earn $115,000-$150,000. Top earners serving {city}'s bilingual market and offering additional services like bookkeeping exceed $150,000.

q2.question: Do I need prior experience to become a tax preparer in {city}?
q2.answer: No, prior experience is not required. Tax Genius Pro provides free 4-6 week training covering everything you need to know. We welcome beginners, career changers, retirees, and stay-at-home parents. You only need a high school diploma, basic computer skills, and willingness to learn.

q3.question: How long does it take to become a certified tax preparer?
q3.answer: You can become a certified tax preparer in just 4-6 weeks with our free self-paced training program. After completing training, we guide you through obtaining your IRS PTIN and certification. Most new preparers are ready to start accepting clients within 6-8 weeks from start.

q4.question: Can I work from home as a tax preparer in {city}?
q4.answer: Absolutely! All of our tax preparers in {city} work remotely. You don't need a physical officeâ€”you can work from anywhere in {city}, whether that's {neighborhood1}, {neighborhood2}, or any neighborhood. All you need is a computer, reliable internet, and a quiet workspace.

q5.question: How much does Tax Genius Pro training cost?
q5.answer: Our training is completely FREE. Zero cost to access our comprehensive training program, study materials, and mentor support. We also help you obtain your PTIN certification at no additional cost. There are no hidden fees or upfront expenses.

q6.question: What hours will I work as a tax preparer?
q6.answer: You set your own hours. During peak tax season (January-April), most preparers work 20-40 hours per week depending on income goals. Off-season, you can work 10-15 hours per week serving business clients. The flexibility is perfect for parents, students, retirees, or anyone seeking work-life balance.

q7.question: Does being bilingual help in the {city} market?
q7.answer: Yes, being bilingual (English/Spanish) is a major advantage in {city}'s diverse market. Bilingual preparers can serve a wider client base and often command premium rates. However, it's not requiredâ€”many successful preparers are English-only.

q8.question: How do I get clients in {city}?
q8.answer: Tax Genius Pro provides clients through our platform, especially when you're starting out. You can also build your own client base through local marketing, referrals, and social media presence. Many preparers combine both approaches to maximize income. We provide all the marketing training and tools you need.

q9.question: Can I earn money outside of tax season?
q9.answer: Definitely! While January-April is peak season, you can offer year-round services like: quarterly business taxes, bookkeeping, tax planning, amended returns, and extensions. Many preparers maintain steady income year-round by serving business clients.

q10.question: What makes Tax Genius Pro different from H&R Block or Liberty Tax?
q10.answer: Unlike H&R Block or Liberty Tax where you work as an employee with a fixed salary, Tax Genius Pro allows you to be your own boss. You set your rates, choose your clients, work from home, and keep a much larger portion of your earnings. Plus, our training is FREE while other companies charge $500-$2,000 for training.
